Kiley, Michael T., and John M. Smith (2017).  “Are Low Real Interest Rates Here to  Stay?” International Journal of Central Banking, vol. 13 (September), pp. 1–42,  https://www.ijcb.org/journal/ijcb17q3a1.pdf. Ruge-Murcia, Francisco (2014).  “Do Inflation-Targeting Central Banks Implicitly Target  the Price Level?” International Journal of Central Banking, vol. 10 (June),  pp. 301–26, https://www.ijcb.org/journal/ijcb14q2a12.pdf.
